reviews.review: Critics are only down voting because they think that makes them look enlightened and cool. You know... like hipsters.
Still stunned...trying to take it all in ðŸ˜®ðŸ˜®ðŸ˜® Mind blown...

Alert: I'm not going to give away any spoilers. 
Now about this film. Mind blowing. Shocking. Hilarious. Visual Masterpiece. Bizzare. Different. And last , one of the best from Marvel. They just nailed this one. I was left speechless after I saw the film, or I would say a cinematic event. Joe and Anthony made every effort to make this one completely different from what we've seen earlier in Marvel Cinematic Universe. It has got some really hilarious jokes , and for sure they are going to give you a laugh. At times it does gets serious , and the gravity of the situation can be genuinely felt, but the trio: Rocket , Groot , Thor, are there at our dispense. The ending is sure to give you a shock, but after the post credit scene, everyone is going to get really excited for the next part. One last thing- don't miss this one at any cost. #learnDC
Third time's a charm. Darker, fascinating and much less nonsense humor. The best of the MCU so far.
Way better than any DC Movie ever produced.

This is the greatest marvel movie of all time. You don't even need to see the previous movies (although recommended), you just need the background on some of the events. You can watch a 10 minute YouTube video to get caught up, and then it will be the greatest movie experience of your life.

DAMN! That was a great emotional(very emotional), thrilling ride. I think my favourite superhero pair up is rocket and Bucky.... or Rocket and Thor.... there are so many great moments between all these superhero characters that we have gotten to know over the last 10 years. The movie flew by that it definitely did not feel like it was a 2 hour 40 min movie. There are so many things that you don't see coming and it makes the movie all the better. I missed Pepperony.
everything is perfect, the jokes, the feels, best 2 hours of my life

I suspect a lot of people will hate the ending.  Keep in mind that there was a lot of key information that came from Dr. Strange.  I don't believe Dr strange spoke in platitudes, and there was a reason why he did what he did.
